channel.title: [PI] Kalphite Queen?
channel.description:
I know a lot of Delta sources have the Kalphite Queen already programmed in. However, I would like to add it to my Project Insanity base. Can anyone link me or instruct me on how to add the Kalphite Queen with the correct gfx and forms please?
Thanks!

item.title: [PI] Kalphite Queen?
item.dc:creator: @Spencer4678 Spencer4678
item.description:
@Spencer4678 wrote:

Thanks, but this wouldnâ€™t make it change forms would it?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Kalphite Queen?
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

step 1. spawn it in desired spot

step 2. Edit it to real settings in npchandler or npc.cfg i cant remeber.

step 3. go to npc handler.java and make a new case kalaphite id if its not there.
put this in it

case npcid:

		return 131;    <--- the attack emote you want it to do

i dont remeber the npcspawn code on death

step 4. Use npc drops and constants to add it some drops

Read full topic
